column5: So Im sitting at home tonite...  burping up bbq.. and this truck drives out and out pops this gentleman I know who is a constant lurker here on the board.  He says.. I was cleaning out the garage and thought you may want this stuff for the prize table...    He said.. this is to say thanks for the entertainement and knowledge I get every day from the board.  So I said... well thanks back, and we sat by the pool and had a couple of cold ones...  What a great place this board is.....  sometimes I forget.
thats great to hear, this board and its members are one big family, lol,  i have personally felt the love,  way to go guys!
Yes, you've brought alot of people together here TJ, its an amazing place.  That was very generous of a fellow "lurking" OFC'r, Thanks  Joey
That's great!  Thanks to the lurker  Maureen
It is a great board,I know I don't always post much but I thoroughly enjoy reading and looking at all the pics.Thanks  Bassman
see not all lurkers are bad lol  cheers!
This board has a great affect on alot of people.

Cant agree with you more Joey!  I really dont think bly and I would be as much into fishing if it wasn't for this community.  This board has really touched a lot of lives in a very positive way....lurkers included!
